name: Dretch

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Chaotic Evil
special_abilities.desc: The dretch radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Energy-Sucking Aura
special_abilities.desc: A non-demon creature that takes an action or bonus action while within 10 feet of a dretch can't take another action, bonus action, or reaction until the start of its next turn.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
